amendment.description: Relating to the review of the status of detainees of the United States Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2516 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 42. Record Vote Number: 319.

action.text: Amendment SA 2516 proposed by Senator Graham to Amendment SA 2515. (consideration: CR S12666-12668; text: CR S12667) Relating to the review of the status of detainees of the United States Government.
